Infecting Google Chrome from PowerShell

CTJB Hacker Camp

1 April 2015 | Slovakia - Official schedule
Slides: https://vavkamil.cz/assets/slides/2015-04-01-chrome-powershell.pdf

In this talk, you will see how easy it is to use PowerShell on Windows 7 to bypass antivirus software and completely take control of a limited-privilege user‚Äôs web browser.
